meanings.sent1: The document was typable, so I quickly typed it up.
meanings.sent2: The typable form made it easy for me to fill in my information.
meanings.sent3: I found a typable treasure map on the computer, how convenient!
meanings.sent4: Her words were typable, flowing effortlessly from her fingers.
meanings.sent5: The typable instructions guided me through the process smoothly.

meanings.definition: Able to be entered or inputted using a keyboard.
meanings.sent1: The website had a typable search bar for easy navigation.
meanings.sent2: The typable password allowed me to access my account.
meanings.sent3: I discovered a typable secret code hidden in the game.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were typable, appearing on the screen as he typed.
meanings.sent5: The typable commands responded instantly to my keyboard input.
